system.effect: The leg explodes in an eruption of blood, killing the target immediately and sending tiny fragments of bone, clothing, and armour hurtling off in all directions. Each target within 2 metres suffers a single hit for 1d10+2 Impact damage to a randomly determined Hit Location. If the target is carrying any ammunition it detonates, inflicting a single hit for [[1d10+5]] Impact damage to a randomly determined Hit Location upon each target within [[1d10]] metres (in addition to the hit noted above). If the target is carrying any grenades or missiles, these detonate immediately with their normal effects.
